name.desc: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL
name.desc_cn: 用于指定控件的名称；如果处理直接提交到URL的表单，则非常有用

landscape.desc: Display the component in landscape mode

mask.desc: Mask (formatting string) used for parsing and formatting value
mask.desc_cn: 用于解析和格式化值的掩码（格式化字符串）

days.desc: List of full day names (DDDD), starting with Sunday
days.desc_cn: 星期几的长名称列表（DDDD），从星期天开始

daysShort.desc: List of short day names (DDD), starting with Sunday
daysShort.desc_cn: 星期几的短名称列表（DDD），从星期天开始

months.desc: List of full month names (MMMM), starting with January
months.desc_cn: 月份的长名称列表（mm），从一月开始

monthsShort.desc: List of short month names (MMM), starting with January
monthsShort.desc_cn: 月份的短名称列表（MMM），从一月开始

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc_cn: 组件的颜色，来自 Quasar 调色板的颜色名称

text-color.desc: Overrides text color (if needed); Color name from the Quasar Color Palette
text-color.desc_cn: 覆盖文本颜色（如果需要）；来自Quasar调色板的颜色名称

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

square.desc: Removes border-radius so borders are squared

flat.desc_cn: 应用“平面”设计（无默认阴影）

bordered.desc: Applies a default border to the component
bordered.desc_cn: 将默认边框应用于组件

model-value.desc: Time of the component; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

format24h.desc: Forces 24 hour time display instead of AM/PM system
format24h.default: (based on Quasar lang language being used)
format24h.desc_cn: 强制24小时显示时间，而不是AM/PM系统

default-date.desc: The default date to use (in YYYY/MM/DD format) when model is unfilled (undefined or null)
default-date.desc_cn: 模型未填充（undefined或null）时要使用的默认日期（YYYY/MM/DD格式）

options.desc: Optionally configure what time is the user allowed to set; Overridden by 'hour-options', 'minute-options' and 'second-options' if those are set; For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline
options.desc_cn: 可选择配置允许用户设置的时间；由“'hour-options”、“minute-options”和“second-options”覆盖（如果已设置）；为了获得最佳性能，请从您的范围中引用它，而不要内联定义它

hour-options.desc: Optionally configure what hours is the user allowed to set; Overrides 'options' prop if that is also set
hour-options.desc_cn: 可选择配置允许用户设置的小时数；覆盖“options”属性（如果已设置）

minute-options.desc: Optionally configure what minutes is the user allowed to set; Overrides 'options' prop if that is also set
minute-options.desc_cn: 可选择配置允许用户设置的分钟数；覆盖“options”属性（如果已设置）

second-options.desc: Optionally configure what seconds is the user allowed to set; Overrides 'options' prop if that is also set
second-options.desc_cn: 可选择配置允许用户设置的秒数；覆盖“options”属性（如果已设置）

with-seconds.desc: Allow the time to be set with seconds

now-btn.desc: Display a button that selects the current time
now-btn.desc_cn: 显示选择当前时间的按钮

default.desc: This is where additional buttons can go
default.desc_cn: 这是额外的按钮的所在位置

update:model-value.desc: Emitted when the component needs to change the model; Is also used by v-model

details.desc: Object of properties on the new model

setNow.desc_cn: 将模型更改为当前时刻
